languages.text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.
languages.original_text: Персонаж с мира-улья может выполнять проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, используя значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, если оно выше.

traits.locale_text: Hive world characters can pass Willpower resistance tests using their Fellowship value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

languages.text: Makropolwelt-Charaktere können {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsproben{/g} mit ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaftswert{/g} bestehen, falls die Gefolgschaft des Charakters höher ist.
languages.original_text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

traits.locale_text: Makropolwelt-Charaktere können {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g}-Widerstandsproben mit ihrem {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaftswert{/g} bestehen, falls die Gefolgschaft des Charakters höher ist.

languages.text: Pour réussir les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} liés à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, les personnages des mondes ruches peuvent utiliser leur valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, si celle-ci est plus élevée.
languages.original_text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

traits.locale_text: Pour réussir les tests de résistance liés à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}, les personnages des mondes ruches peuvent utiliser leur valeur de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fraternité{/g}, si celle-ci est plus élevée.

languages.text: 巢都世界的角色在进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，如果该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}较高，可以使用社交进行检定。
languages.original_text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

traits.locale_text: 巢都世界的角色在进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性检定时，如果该角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}较高，可以使用社交进行检定。

languages.text: Los personajes de mundos colmena pueden hacer las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} usando su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} si su puntuación de Empatía es más alta.
languages.original_text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

traits.locale_text: Los personajes de mundos colmena pueden hacer las pruebas de fortaleza de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} usando su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g} si su puntuación de Empatía es más alta.

languages.text: 過密惑星のキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}値を使って行うことができる（連帯の方が高い場合）
languages.original_text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

traits.locale_text: 過密惑星のキャラクターは、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗判定を{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}値を使って行うことができる（連帯の方が高い場合）

languages.text: Персонаж с мира-улья может выполнять проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}, используя значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, если оно выше.
languages.original_text: Hive world characters can pass {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance tests{/g} using their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} value instead, if the character's Fellowship is higher.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж из мира-улья может проходить проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на сопротивление, используя значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, если оно выше.
Персонаж из мира-улья может проходить проверки {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на сопротивление, используя значение {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}, если оно выше.
